title: Lab marks not out yet
content: Will the lab marks of Python and Chemistry/Physics be released together with the ESA marks or will it be declared before that? (Sem 1)

comments.body: You never get to know your lab marks you just hope you got full, is what seniors told.
I hope the lab marks are not included in the assignment marks and its seperate...

The lab marks are the viva and hacker rank etc right?
It's not lab submissions right?
And what did we do as python assignment?
